details:
It was discovered that there was a potential memory corruption vulnerability
in the lz4 compression algorithm library.


* [CVE-2021-3520](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-3520)
memory corruption due to an integer overflow bug caused by memmove
 argument


For Debian 9 Stretch, these problems have been fixed in version
0.0~r131-2+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your lz4 packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
